title: Should we bury our hopes for Yorick Rework anytime soon?
body: Do we have any new info on Yorick rework?? After Taric updates??? He's buried in the champion pool in the new season -.- Rito pls

replies.body: {{champion:6}} y u no give crab some love rito

Urgot's kit is in a really good spot at the moment, his synergy with thunderlords decree (it scales better with AD than AP) and the 45% CDR cap, and is very good against carrys, both ranged and melee ADC, as well as most AP carrys. He does need a visual update though, his base skin doesn't look particularly great.

he does shred the top metas hard. so funny i also enjoy playing him support with a few premade adcs.

he needs a visual update something chronic.

Maybe tuck your hopes away for a while. A few other champions have been/currently are on the burner for reworks. For the list of champions that have been recently updated or are being worked on, check out the [**Champion Update Schedule**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule).
